# init(for:)

**Initializer**

Creates a text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(for windowScene: UIWindowScene)
```

## Creating a Text-Formatting Coordinator

- **init(windowScene:)**: Initializes and returns a new text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.
